00616 enum {
00617   eUnknownBusCtrl=0,
00618   eEnableSelectmap,  // enable the select map mode, interface has to be in msg buffer mode
00619   eDisableSelectmap,
00620   eEnableFlash,      // enable the flash mode, interface has to be in msg buffer mode
00621   eDisableFlash,
00622   eEnableMsgBuf,     // disable both select map and flash mode
00623   eResetFirmware,    // trigger a firmware reset sequence
00624   eReadCtrlReg,      // read the value of the control register
00625   eCheckSelectmap,   // check whether in mode selectmap
00626   eCheckFlash,       // check whether in mode flash
00627   eCheckMsgBuf,      // check whether in mode msg buffer
00628   eResetFlash,       // send reset command to flash
00629   eFlashID,          // read the flash id
00630   eFlashCtrlDCS,     // all flash control done by the DCS board FW, since FW version 2.2
00631   eFlashCtrlActel,   // all flash control done by the RCU Actel FW
00632   eEnableCompression,// use compressed data in msg buffer whenever possible
00633   eDisableCompression
00634 };
